sentences.english: Some information is wedding issued by the company.
sentences.chinese: 有的信息是婚庆公司发布的。

sentences.english: Linzi wedding scene layout needs to pay attention to what the problem?
sentences.chinese: 临淄婚庆现场布置需要注意哪些问题？

sentences.english: Current conditions and prospects of carton packaging of wedding candy were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了婚庆喜糖纸盒包装的市场现状及前景。

sentences.english: The history of the nuptial pastry, though, is even stranger than these modern rituals suggests.
sentences.chinese: 然而婚庆糕点史比这些现代仪典表现的还要离奇。

sentences.english: Self-service wedding for friends provides a new form.
sentences.chinese: 自助式婚庆为朋友相聚提供了一种新形式。

sentences.english: The Longkou wedding net calls the marriage network.

sentences.english: Radiant celebration etiquette company dedicated to add brilliance to your wedding.
sentences.chinese: 喜洋洋庆典礼仪公司竭诚为您的婚庆增添光彩。

sentences.english: Located on two levels, it has a capacity to host different wedding events at the same time without interference.
sentences.chinese: 有两层楼专门为客人举办婚庆典礼，不受任何干扰。

sentences.english: This is a kind of chengdu sadly arisen wedding of new form.
sentences.chinese: 这是成都悄然兴起的一种婚庆新形式。

sentences.english: Southeast Asia Restaurant is a strength-type wedding celebration theme hotel that has advantage of facility and service.
sentences.chinese: 拥设施和服务优势的实力型婚庆主题酒店。
